ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.dll is taken from the SharpDevelop project
http://www.icsharpcode.net/OpenSource/SD/

http://www.icsharpcode.net/opensource/sharpziplib/Download.aspx
I have compiled the version for .Net 4.0 to avoid warnings on the linux build server:
current version: Version=0.86.0.518 for .Net 4.0


ICSharpCode.NRefactory.dll is taken from the SharpDevelop project
we are using version 4.1.0.8000 from SharpDevelop 4.1
